subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Tom Seaver, one of 24 major league pitchers to win 300 games, started 647 games and was a reliever in nine. Tom Glavine is the only 300-game winner who never pitched in relief; he started 682 times.
snippet: Tom Seaver, one of 24 major league pitchers to win 300 games, started 647 games and was a reliever in nine. Tom Glavine is the only 300-game winner who never pitched in relief; he started 682 times.
